text:
Abolfazl Anvari (9 February 1938 – 14 February 2018) was an Iranian heavyweight freestyle wrestler. He was born in Saveh, Iran. He won bronze medals at the 1966 and 1969 World Championships and at the 1970 Asian Games. He placed fourth at the 1967 World Championships and sixth at the 1968 Summer Olympics.
Anvari died on 14 February 2018 in Tehran at the age of 80.
